sourcesContent: import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { filter, tap } from 'rxjs'; import { UserServiceService } from 'src/app/user-service.service'; import { IUser } from '../user'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-cla', templateUrl: './add-cla.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-cla.component.css'] }) export class AddClaComponent implements OnInit { Teachers: IUser[] = []; constructor(private teacher:UserServiceService){} ngOnInit(): void { this.teacher.getTeacher() .subscribe((data: IUser[]) => { // Filter users by role 'student' this.Teachers = data.filter(user => user.role === 'Professeur'); console.log(this.Teachers); }); } }
